c74object.name: crucible
c74object.description: The `crucible` object receives track data and compares it against an existing dictionary. If the new data (challenger) has a higher rating than the existing data (incumbent), it overwrites the incumbent dictionary and outputs the new data.

inlet.digest: Inlet 1: Challenger data stream or Incumbent dictionary name
inlet.description: Receives the detailed bar data from `buildspans` or a symbol to set the incumbent dictionary name.

outlet.description: Outputs [palette, track, bar, offset] or [- track reach offset].
Outputs the current global reach of the song.
If the verbose attribute is enabled, this outlet provides diagnostic information.

method.name: anything
method.description: Parses hierarchical selectors and manages comparison logic.

attribute.name: verbose
attribute.description: When enabled (1), creates an additional outlet for status information.
